column5: Ive tried a few different things and i cant get it to come off. I have been searching the net and all i can find is information about jam nuts and shift linkages that may need to be undone in order for the unit to fall. Anyone have any ideas?? Thanks !
check behind the water intake covers for the linkage
Will be buying a manual for this one!
Before you do that go HERE and hopefully you can save a buck or two.
I know on the older models of mercs, that they have to be IN foward gear to get the lower end off. That is something you need to check before you go any further.
Thanks everyone for your help! Drifter excellent link solved my problem and kept a few more dollars in my pocket!
